sentence.Network_en: But extreme ethnocentrism and may also be abused in political purposes.
sentence.Network_cn: 但极端的种族中心主义还有可能被滥用于政治目的.

sentence.Network_en: Besides the incommensurability of different traditions, ethnocentrism often makes a dialogue between different traditions merely nominal.
sentence.Network_cn: 此外,不可通约的文化传统以及种族中心主义常常使对话有名无实.

sentence.Network_en: Now, on other cultural anthropologists and sociologists who are consciously trying to avoid ethnocentrism.
sentence.Network_cn: 现在, 研究其他文化的人类学家和社会学家们都自觉地试图避免种族中心主义.
